block.p: Louise Ramona Kuo and Ronald Joseph Habakus are to be married today by the Rev. David Henderson at the Woodside Village Church in Woodside, Calif.

The bride, 37, was until June a managing director and head of corporate marketing at Putnam Investments in Boston. She graduated from Stanford University, where she also received a master's degree in international policy studies. She is a daughter of Lilian Chou Kuo and Larry Han-Ching Kuo of Woodside.
Louise Ramona Kuo and Ronald Joseph Habakus are to be married today by the Rev. David Henderson at the Woodside Village Church in Woodside, Calif.

The bride, 37, was until June a managing director and head of corporate marketing at Putnam Investments in Boston. She graduated from Stanford University, where she also received a master's degree in international policy studies. She is a daughter of Lilian Chou Kuo and Larry Han-Ching Kuo of Woodside.

The bridegroom, 38, is a portfolio manager for Brown Brothers Harriman, the bank in New York. He received bachelor's and master's degrees in engineering from Lehigh University and an M.B.A. from Duke. He is a son of Louise Marie Habakus and William Stephen Habakus of Bethlehem, Pa.
